diff_user.system:
You are an expert data engineer specializing in converting data to text. You will be given the current Python program with its scores and an inspiration program and your task will be to evolve the current Python program to improve the scores. It is a program that converts a list of triples into natural language text. The given triples will be associated with the topic: Airport. The program must implement a function called 'predict' that accepts a list of triples and generates a coherent, contextually relevant sentence that accurately represents the information contained in the triples. Ensure that the generated text is fluent, grammatically correct, and maintains the meaning of the original data. There can be multiple triples given that make up a complex sentence. Converting all those triples into one sentence will award greater score. There is also a dedicated score for sentence count called avg_sentences_length_score, where 1.0 is a perfect sentence count and 0.0 is the worst sentence count. An example of a complex sentence:
Triples:
(Antwerp | cityServed | Antwerp International Airport)
(Belgium | country | Antwerp)
(City of Brussels | capital | Belgium)
Example sentence:
"Antwerp International Airport serves the city of Antwerp which is in Belgium, where the capital is Brussels."

The 'predict' function returns that sentence as a string. Below is the list of all possible predicates that can be given as an input. With the given predicates and example triples implement the 'predict' function so it can process all the possible predicates:

Predicate: cityServed - Example triple: (Aarhus Airport | cityServed | "Aarhus, Denmark")
Predicate: elevationAboveTheSeaLevel - Example triple: (Aarhus Airport | elevationAboveTheSeaLevel | 25.0)
Predicate: location - Example triple: (Aarhus Airport | location | Tirstrup)
Predicate: operatingOrganisation - Example triple: (Aarhus Airport | operatingOrganisation | "Aarhus Lufthavn A/S")
Predicate: runwayLength - Example triple: (Aarhus Airport | runwayLength | 2776.0)
Predicate: runwayName - Example triple: (Aarhus Airport | runwayName | "10L/28R")
Predicate: country - Example triple: (Abilene, Texas | country | United States)
Predicate: isPartOf - Example triple: (Abilene, Texas | isPartOf | Jones County, Texas)
Predicate: 1stRunwayLengthFeet - Example triple: (Abilene Regional Airport | 1stRunwayLengthFeet | 3678)
Predicate: 1stRunwaySurfaceType - Example triple: (Abilene Regional Airport | 1stRunwaySurfaceType | Asphalt)
Predicate: 3rdRunwayLengthFeet - Example triple: (Abilene Regional Airport | 3rdRunwayLengthFeet | 7202)
Predicate: icaoLocationIdentifier - Example triple: (Abilene Regional Airport | icaoLocationIdentifier | "KABI")
Predicate: locationIdentifier - Example triple: (Abilene Regional Airport | locationIdentifier | "ABI")
Predicate: elevationAboveTheSeaLevelInFeet - Example triple: (Afonso Pena International Airport | elevationAboveTheSeaLevelInFeet | 2988)
Predicate: iataLocationIdentifier - Example triple: (Agra Airport | iataLocationIdentifier | "AGR")
Predicate: nativeName - Example triple: (Agra Airport | nativeName | "Kheria Air Force Station")
Predicate: leaderParty - Example triple: (Alcobendas | leaderParty | People's Party (Spain))
Predicate: capital - Example triple: (Alderney | capital | Saint Anne, Alderney)
Predicate: language - Example triple: (Alderney | language | English language)
Predicate: leader - Example triple: (Alderney | leader | Elizabeth II)
Predicate: owner - Example triple: (Alpena County Regional Airport | owner | Alpena County, Michigan)
Predicate: 1stRunwayLengthMetre - Example triple: (Amsterdam Airport Schiphol | 1stRunwayLengthMetre | 3800)
Predicate: 4thRunwaySurfaceType - Example triple: (Amsterdam Airport Schiphol | 4thRunwaySurfaceType | "Asphalt")
Predicate: 5thRunwayNumber - Example triple: (Amsterdam Airport Schiphol | 5thRunwayNumber | 18)
Predicate: largestCity - Example triple: (Andrews County, Texas | largestCity | Andrews, Texas)
Predicate: 4thRunwayLengthFeet - Example triple: (Andrews County Airport | 4thRunwayLengthFeet | 25)
Predicate: 1stRunwayNumber - Example triple: (Angola International Airport | 1stRunwayNumber | 5)
Predicate: elevationAboveTheSeaLevelInMetres - Example triple: (Angola International Airport | elevationAboveTheSeaLevelInMetres | 159)
Predicate: administrativeArrondissement - Example triple: (Antwerp | administrativeArrondissement | Arrondissement of Antwerp)
Predicate: mayor - Example triple: (Antwerp | mayor | Bart De Wever)
Predicate: 2ndRunwaySurfaceType - Example triple: (Ardmore Airport (New Zealand) | 2ndRunwaySurfaceType | Poaceae)
Predicate: 3rdRunwaySurfaceType - Example triple: (Ardmore Airport (New Zealand) | 3rdRunwaySurfaceType | Poaceae)
Predicate: runwaySurfaceType - Example triple: (Atlantic City International Airport | runwaySurfaceType | "Asphalt/Concrete")
Predicate: officialLanguage - Example triple: (Belgium | officialLanguage | French language)
Predicate: city - Example triple: (ENAIRE | city | Madrid)
Predicate: jurisdiction - Example triple: (Flemish Government | jurisdiction | Flanders)
Predicate: demonym - Example triple: (Greece | demonym | Greeks)
Predicate: aircraftHelicopter - Example triple: (Indian Air Force | aircraftHelicopter | HAL Light Combat Helicopter)
Predicate: transportAircraft - Example triple: (Indian Air Force | transportAircraft | Boeing C-17 Globemaster III)
Predicate: currency - Example triple: (Iraq | currency | Iraqi dinar)
Predicate: headquarter - Example triple: (Pakistan Civil Aviation Authority | headquarter | Jinnah International Airport)
Predicate: class - Example triple: (Poaceae | class | Monocotyledon)
Predicate: division - Example triple: (Poaceae | division | Flowering plant)
Predicate: order - Example triple: (Poaceae | order | Commelinids)
Predicate: regionServed - Example triple: (Port Authority of New York and New Jersey | regionServed | New York)
Predicate: leaderTitle - Example triple: (Punjab, Pakistan | leaderTitle | Provincial Assembly of the Punjab)
Predicate: hubAirport - Example triple: (Turkmenistan Airlines | hubAirport | Ashgabat International Airport)
Predicate: aircraftFighter - Example triple: (United States Air Force | aircraftFighter | General Dynamics F-16 Fighting Falcon)
Predicate: attackAircraft - Example triple: (United States Air Force | attackAircraft | Lockheed AC-130)
Predicate: battle - Example triple: (United States Air Force | battle | Invasion of Grenada)
Predicate: 5thRunwaySurfaceType - Example triple: (Amsterdam Airport Schiphol | 5thRunwaySurfaceType | "Asphalt")
Predicate: countySeat - Example triple: (Andrews County, Texas | countySeat | Andrews, Texas)
Predicate: chief - Example triple: (South Jersey Transportation Authority | chief | Stephen Dilts)
Predicate: foundedBy - Example triple: (MotorSport Vision | foundedBy | Peter Ogden)
Predicate: postalCode - Example triple: (Thurleigh | postalCode | MK44)
Predicate: areaCode - Example triple: (Thurleigh | areaCode | 01234)
Predicate: foundingYear - Example triple: (MotorSport Vision | foundingYear | 2004)
Predicate: ceremonialCounty - Example triple: (Thurleigh | ceremonialCounty | Bedfordshire)

artifacts_json:
{"poor_program_score_88": "The program did very poorly with the given triples, getting BLEU score 0.0. The input triples were:
Greece | leader | Prokopis Pavlopoulos

The generated text was:
Greece is led by Prokopis Pavlopoulos.

The example correct sentences are:
Greece's leader name is Prokopis Pavlopoulos.
Prokopis Pavlopoulos is the leader of Greece.
Prokopis Pavlopoulos is the name of the Leader of Greece.
", "poor_program_score_109": "The program did very poorly with the given triples, getting BLEU score 0.0. The input triples were:
